summary: A wife, her two-timing husband and a flirting neighbor are unpredictable competitors in a warped game that turns into a life-or-death affair.
cast: Rebecca De Mornay|Michael Rooker|Mark Rolston|Lisa Zane|Shareen Mitchell|Lauren Summers|Adele Yoshioka|Ari Barak|Diane Robin|Peter Dobson|Dale Dye|Keli Daniels|Michael Guerin|Melissa Holbrook|Patrick O'Neal|Phil Hawn
keywords: double life|dysfunctional marriage|husband wife relationship|female protagonist|tension
title: Vidas separadas
